name: Sewer Kings
description:
Controls: 

Walk/Move Cursor = Arrow keys or WASD

Look = L or Q

Talk = K or E

Look or Talk in detail = press Enter

Exit Window = Esc

Sewer Kings is a quick Summer project. I'm testing out a few new skills for myself like walker generation and using classes. Currently there is nothing to do except look and talk to NPCs. I'm currently prototyping combat/engagement systems. If you have ideas/suggestions, please feel free to tell me.

I'm using DragonDePlatino's curses24x24 tileset they made for the game Dwarf Fortress with permission under a CC BY-SA 4.0 License.

This is a Godot Game Engine project, using version 3.4.4
